markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Vibrant Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=1822)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
<trait label="Wood" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=508" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 377 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your body sprouts brambly thorns that thrive on life magic. Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that hit you with [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks, take 1 piercing damage each time they do. Anytime you cast a [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) spell, the thorns' damage increases to 1d6 until the start of your next turn.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1, or 1d6 after you cast a vitality spell.
name: Vibrant Thorns

summary_markdown: Your body sprouts brambly thorns that thrive on life magic.
text: Vibrant Thorns Single Action Source Player Core pg. 377 2.0 Domain Nature Duration 1 minute --- Your body sprouts brambly thorns that thrive on life magic. Adjacent creatures that hit you with a melee attack, as well as creatures that hit you with unarmed attacks, take 1 piercing damage each time they do. Anytime you cast a vitality spell, the thorns' damage increases to 1d6 until the start of your next turn. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1, or 1d6 after you cast a vitality spell.
